mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_NEW (NEW_NO , NEW_EMPNO , NEW_CN , WRTING_DT , NEW_AT , DOC_NO , DOC_CATEGORY) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(NEW_NO), 0)+1 AS newNo FROM TB_NEW) , #{newEmpno} , #{newCn} , SYSDATE , 'N' , #{docNo} , #{docCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT NEW_NO , NEW_EMPNO , NEW_CN , TO_CHAR(WRTING_DT, 'YYYY-MM-dd HH24:MI') AS WRTING_DT , NEW_AT , DOC_NO , DOC_CATEGORY FROM TB_NEW WHERE NEW_EMPNO = #{empno} AND NEW_AT = 'N' ORDER BY WRTING_DT DESC
